title: LEAVEBUSTER STUCKED IN CHAMP SELECT TIMER AT 0 FOR 5 MINUTES
body: I joined a ranked game choose my champion and all game started the first time this happened i wasn't the only one that got stuck 3 other people did and we were talking when the timer was at 0 for basically 3 minutes before i decided to actually leave the client and restart it. After restarting the client i trying to get into queue and it wouldnt let me i checked on op.gg and i was ingame WTF my client didnt let me connect to the game and im sure the other 3 people got the same thing. Now, i can finnaly get back on queue for waiting 5 minutes because people were ingame so they decided to remake. I get back in queue and the same things happened to me AGAIN but then my team did a remake and i got leave buster for 5 games and loss lp 2 games in arow wtf RIOT i know the issue isnt my fault because the first time it happened to 3 members of my team and we were actually avaible to talk to each other at the 0 timer thing i wouldve like to take a screenshot but i didnt came to my mind so RIP. Fix your game RIOT and my leave buster as well this shit is annoying.
